001import javax.swing.JDialog;
002import javax.swing.JPanel;
003import javax.swing.JLabel;
004import javax.swing.BoxLayout;
005import java.awt.Color;
006import java.awt.BorderLayout;
007
008/**
009 * Décrivez votre classe TradeWindow ici.
010 *
011 * @author (votre nom)
012 * @version (un numéro de version ou une date)
013 */
014public class TradeWindow {
015    private JDialog aDialog;
016    private JPanel aMCCenterPanel;
017    private JPanel aPNJCenterPanel;
018    private JPanel aMainPanel;
019    
020    private JLabel aMCWalletLabel;
021    private JLabel aPNJWalletLabel;
022    
023    /**
024     * Constructeur d'objets de classe TradeWindow
025     */
026    public TradeWindow(final MC pMC, final PNJ pPNJ, final UserInterface pUI, final GameEngine pGE) {
027        this.aDialog = new JDialog(pUI.getFrame(), JDialog.ModalityType.APPLICATION_MODAL);
028        this.aMCCenterPanel = new JPanel();
029        this.aPNJCenterPanel = new JPanel();
030        this.aMCWalletLabel = new JLabel("" + pMC.getWallet().getMoney());
031        this.aPNJWalletLabel = new JLabel("" + pPNJ.getWallet().getMoney());
032        
033        this.aDialog.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
034        
035        this.aMainPanel = new JPanel();
036        this.aMainPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
037        this.aMainPanel.setBackground(new Color(20, 0, 0));
038        
039        JPanel vButtonPanel = new JPanel();
040        vButtonPanel.setBackground(new Color(56, 51, 51));
041        
042        ConfirmButton vConfirmButton = new ConfirmButton("Confirmer", this.aDialog, pUI);
043        CancelButton vCancelButton = new CancelButton("Annuler", this.aDialog, pUI);
044        
045        vButtonPanel.add(vConfirmButton);
046        vButtonPanel.add(vCancelButton);
047        
048        this.aMainPanel.add(vButtonPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
049        
050        // Création des copies d'ItemList et de Wallet
051        ItemList vMCIL = (ItemList)pMC.getItemList().clone();
052        ItemList vPNJIL = (ItemList)pPNJ.getItemList().clone();
053        
054        Wallet vMCWallet = (Wallet)pMC.getWallet().clone();
055        Wallet vPNJWallet = (Wallet)pPNJ.getWallet().clone();
056        
057        // Wallet
058        
059        // Création des panels d'inventaire
060        JPanel vCenterPanel = new JPanel();
061        vCenterPanel.setLayout(new BoxLayout(vCenterPanel, BoxLayout.X_AXIS));
062        
063        JPanel vMCMainPanel = new JPanel();
064        JPanel vPNJMainPanel = new JPanel();
065        vMCMainPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
066        vPNJMainPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
067        
068        JPanel vMCLabelPanel = new JPanel();
069        JPanel vPNJLabelPanel = new JPanel();
070        
071        JPanel vMCWalletPanel = new JPanel();
072        JPanel vPNJWalletPanel = new JPanel();
073        
074        JPanel vMCCenterPanel = new JPanel();
075        JPanel vPNJCenterPanel = new JPanel();
076        
077        // Setup des panels
078        
079        JLabel vMCLabel = new JLabel("Mon inventaire");
080        JLabel vPNJLabel = new JLabel(pPNJ.getFullName());
081        
082        JLabel vMCWalletLabel = new JLabel("" + vMCWallet.getMoney());
083        JLabel vPNJWalletLabel = new JLabel("" + vPNJWallet.getMoney());
084        
085        vMCMainPanel.add(vMCLabel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
086        vPNJMainPanel.add(vPNJLabel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
087        
088        vMCWalletPanel.add(vMCWalletLabel);
089        vPNJWalletPanel.add(vMCWalletLabel);
090        
091        this.addTradeButtons(pMC, vMCCenterPanel, vMCMainPanel, vMCIL);
092        this.addTradeButtons(pPNJ, vPNJCenterPanel, vPNJMainPanel, vPNJIL);
093        
094        vCenterPanel.add(vMCMainPanel);
095        vCenterPanel.add(vPNJMainPanel);
096        
097        this.aMainPanel.add(vCenterPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
098        
099        this.aDialog.add(this.aMainPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
100        this.aDialog.setSize(500, 300);
101        this.aDialog.setUndecorated(true);
102        this.aDialog.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
103        
104        this.aDialog.setVisible(true);
105    }
106    
107    private void addTradeButtons(final Player pP, final JPanel pItemPanel, final JPanel vMainPanel, final ItemList pIL) {
108        System.out.println("ajout");
109        for(String vItemName : pIL.getItems().keySet()) {
110            pItemPanel.add(new TradeItemButton(vItemName, this, pP));
111        }
112        vMainPanel.add(pItemPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
113    }
114    
115    public JDialog getDialog() {
116        return this.aDialog;
117    }
118    
119    public JPanel getMCCenterPanel() {
120        return this.aMCCenterPanel;
121    }
122    
123    public JPanel getPNJCenterPanel() {
124        return this.aPNJCenterPanel;
125    }
126    
127    public JPanel getMainPanel() {
128        return this.aMainPanel;
129    }
130    
131    public JLabel getMCWalletLabel() {
132        return this.aMCWalletLabel;
133    }
134    
135    public JLabel getPNJWalletLabel() {
136        return this.aPNJWalletLabel;
137    }
138}
